workflow.name: Instant lead notifications with Gmail/SMTP for teams & auto-responses
workflow.description:
üöÄ Never miss a new lead again ‚Äî get instant email alerts and stay ahead of every opportunity!

This workflow automatically notifies your team the moment a new lead is created in your CRM or form submission. It keeps your sales, marketing, and support teams aligned ‚Äî so no lead goes unnoticed, and every customer feels heard right away.

‚ú® How it works

  • ‚úÖ Capture: A webhook receives new lead data from your CRM or online form.
  • üß© Clean: The workflow filters and formats the data for clear presentation.
  • üíå Compose: Generates a beautiful HTML email with your branding and lead details.
  • üì® Send: Instantly emails your team or the lead using Gmail or SMTP.
  • ‚ö° React Fast: Your team gets notified in seconds ‚Äî no manual checks needed!

‚öôÔ∏è Set up steps

  • üîó Add a POST webhook in your CRM or app that points to your n8n webhook URL.
  • üè¢ Update your company info (logo, name, website) in the configuration node.
  • üìß Connect Gmail OAuth2 or your SMTP credentials to send branded emails instantly.

Compatible with Odoo, HubSpot, Zoho CRM, Salesforce, Pipedrive, Typeform, and any system that supports outgoing webhooks.

parameters.subject: =Thank you for showing interest ‚Äî our team will contact you shortly

parameters.jsCode:
// Loop over input items and add a new field called 'myNewField' to the JSON of each one const sample_data = [ { "headers": { "host": "n8n.yourdomain.com", "x-real-ip": "0.0.0.0", "x-forwarded-for": "2603:3:610f:580::, 0.0.0.0", "x-forwarded-proto": "http", "connection": "upgrade", "content-length": "461", "user-agent": "python-requests/2.25.1", "content-type": "application/json", "accept": "*/*", "cf-ray": "99ccd7119db946e0-SIN", "accept-encoding": "gzip, br", "cdn-loop": "cloudflare; loops=1", "cf-connecting-ip": "2603:3:610f:580::", "cf-visitor": "{\"scheme\":\"https\"}" }, "params": {}, "query": {}, "body": { "_action": "Send Webhook Notification(#635)", "_id": 80, "_model": "crm.lead", "contact_name": "Vivek Vithalani", "create_date": "2025-11-11 09:41:30.531789", "description": "

Q1 Lead Automation Testing question
Q2 Lead Automation Testing question
Q3 Lead Automation Testing question

", "display_name": "Lead Automation Testing", "email_from": "user@example.com", "expected_revenue": 0, "id": 80, "phone": "9426264288", "probability": 0.29 }, "webhookUrl": "https://n8n.yourdomain.com/webhook/automation/lead-create", "executionMode": "production" } ]; return sample_data;

parameters.content:
### Lead Automation Email Workflow

### This workflow automatically sends email alerts whenever a new lead is created from any CRM, web form, or connected app.  
### It also supports optional thank-you or confirmation emails to the lead for faster and more professional responses.

---

## How It Works

When a new lead is created in your CRM or form, a POST request is sent to your n8n webhook.  
The workflow then performs these steps:

1. **Receives Data:** The webhook captures the incoming lead information.  
2. **Cleans Payload:** A Code node removes unnecessary fields (like `_model` or `_action`).  
3. **Formats the Data:** The workflow prepares a clean, structured dataset.  
4. **Generates the Email Template:** The HTML node inserts the data into a professional email layout.  
5. **Sends Emails:**  
   - One message goes to your internal sales or marketing inbox.  
   - Optionally, another email goes to the lead as a thank-you or confirmation.  
6. **Instant Delivery:** Emails are sent within seconds using Gmail OAuth2 or SMTP.

This process ensures your team and customers stay informed in real time.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Guide

### 1. Configure the Webhook in Your CRM

Create a webhook or automation rule in your CRM that sends a **POST** request to your n8n endpoint:

```
https://n8n.yourdomain.com/webhook/automation/lead-create/email
```

Example JSON payload:
```json
{
  "id": 123,
  "display_name": "John Doe",
  "email_from": "john.doe@example.com",
  "phone": "+1 9876543210",
  "description": "Interested in our service package",
  "create_date": "2025-11-12 09:30:00"
}
```

This setup works with any system ‚Äî **Odoo**, **HubSpot**, **Zoho**, **Pipedrive**, **Salesforce**, or a custom CRM that supports outgoing webhooks.

---

### 2. Configure Company Information

Use the **Company Config Node** (Set node) to define your business details for the email template:

```json
{
  "company_name": "Your Company Name",
  "company_logo_url": "https://yourdomain.com/logo.png",
  "website_url": "https://yourdomain.com",
  "contact_url": "https://yourdomain.com/contact",
  "copy_right_year": "2025"
}
```

These values are used automatically inside your email header or footer.

---

### 3. Configure Email Sending Method

You can send emails through one of the following options:

#### Option A ‚Äî Gmail (OAuth2)
Connect your Gmail account securely with OAuth2 for quick setup.

#### Option B ‚Äî SMTP
Use your company‚Äôs SMTP server to send emails from a custom domain.

Both options are already integrated in this workflow ‚Äî just configure credentials in n8n.

---

**Created by:** v3codestudio  
**Category:** CRM / Email / Automation  
**Purpose:** Automate lead notifications and email follow-ups from any CRM system.

## Request & Validation
Receives the API request and checks for the required ‚Äúname‚Äù parameter.
Returns a validation message if missing.
## Manual Trigger node and Sample Data

## HTML Template
- Prepare Awesome HTML template.

## Email
- Send an automated email to the configured recipient through the Gmail / SMTP mail integration.

## Company Email Address
- Enter your email address in this node to receive notifications whenever a new lead is created.

## Prepare Data / Clean Payload
- Remove unused key from JSON data

## Send Email to Reception
- Send a polite thank-you email to the client, expressing appreciation for their interest in our services.

## Client HTML Template
- Client HTML template ‚Äî thank you email.

- company_name
- company_logo_url
- website_url
- copy_right_year
- contact_url

## Send Email (Gmail / SMTP Switch)
- Switch to send email via Gmail or SMTP.
